item.title: Introducing Microsoft Marketplace — Thousands of solutions. Millions of customers. One Marketplace. - The Official Microsoft Blog
item.description: A new breed of industry-leading company is taking shape — Frontier Firms. These organizations blend human ambition with AI-powered technology to reshape how innovation is scaled, work is orchestrated and value is created. They’re accelerating AI transformation to enrich employee experiences, reinvent customer engagement, reshape business processes and unlock creativity and innovation. To empower customers...

item.title: Canada Goes All In on AI: NVIDIA Joins Nations’ Technology Leaders in Montreal to Shape Sovereign AI Strategy
item.description: NVIDIA’s Kari Briski joins Canada’s AI Minister Evan Solomon and Cohere’s Aidan Gomez in a panel this week, as TELUS unveils Canada’s first fully sovereign AI factory in Rimouski and RBC Capital Markets creates AI agents for financial services.

item.title: NVIDIA, OpenAI Announce 'the Biggest AI Infrastructure Deployment in History'
item.description: OpenAI and NVIDIA announced a partnership that will scale OpenAI’s compute with at least 10 gigawatts of data centers powered by millions of GPUs.

item.title: The UK’s ‘Goldilocks Moment for AI’: NVIDIA, UK and US Leaders Highlight AI Infrastructure Investments
item.description: NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang discussed the UK’s plans to become an AI superpower with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, UK Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology Liz Kendall, UK Secretary of State for Business and Trade Peter Kyle, and US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick.

item.title: Inside the world’s most powerful AI datacenter - The Official Microsoft Blog
item.description: This week we have introduced a wave of purpose-built datacenters and infrastructure investments we are making around the world to support the global adoption of cutting-edge AI workloads and cloud services. Today in Wisconsin we introduced Fairwater, our newest US AI datacenter, the largest and most sophisticated AI factory we’ve built yet. In addition to...

item.title: How Prime members can get early tickets for 'Wicked: For Good’ only on Fandango
item.description: Prime members will be able to buy tickets to the early screening of ‘Wicked: For Good’ and see it four days before its theatrical release.

item.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
item.description: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

item.title: NVIDIA Accelerates Robotics Research and Development With New Open Models and Simulation Libraries
item.description: NVIDIA today announced that the open‑source Newton Physics Engine is now available in NVIDIA Isaac™ Lab, along with the open NVIDIA Isaac GR00T N1.6 reasoning vision language action model for robot skills and new AI infrastructure.

item.title: OpenAI and NVIDIA Announce Strategic Partnership to Deploy 10 Gigawatts of NVIDIA Systems
item.description: OpenAI and NVIDIA today announced a letter of intent for a landmark strategic partnership to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of NVIDIA systems for OpenAI’s next-generation AI infrastructure to train and run its next generation of models on the path to deploying superintelligence.

item.title: New Shepard’s Crewed NS-36 Mission Targets Liftoff on October 8 | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin announced its next New Shepard crewed flight, NS-36, will lift off from Launch Site One in West Texas on Wednesday, October 8.

item.title: Blue Origin and Luxembourg Partner on Oasis-1 Mission to Map Lunar Resources | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin today announced Project Oasis, a multi-phase initiative to identify key lunar resources from orbit, assess them on the ground, and harness them in situ.

item.title: Florida Investment Matches Our Ambitious Growth Plans | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin employs nearly 4,000 people in Brevard County and has invested over $2.3 billion with 500 suppliers in Florida, generating significant economic growth and employment in the region.

item.title: Blue Origin Completes 35th New Shepard Mission | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin successfully completed its 35th New Shepard flight and 15th payload mission today from Launch Site One in West Texas.
